verses.verse: And he showed <S%G1166><s%> me a pure <S%G2513><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> clear <S%G2986><s%> as crystal, <S%G2930><s%> proceeding <S%G1607><s%> out of the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

In the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the street <S%G4113><s%> of it, and on <S%G1909><s%> either <S%G1782><s%> <S%G2532><s%> side <S%G1782><s%> of the river, <S%G4215><s%> was there the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> which bore <S%G4160><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> manner of fruits, <S%G2590><s%> and yielded <S%G591><s%> her fruit <S%G2590><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> month: <S%G3376><s%> and the leaves <S%G5444><s%> of the tree <S%G3586><s%> were for the healing <S%G2322><s%> of the nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And there shall be no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> curse: <S%G2652><s%> but the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> shall be in it; and his servants <S%G1401><s%> shall serve <S%G3000><s%> him:
And they shall see <S%G3708><s%> his face; <S%G4383><s%> and his name <S%G3686><s%> shall be in their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And there shall be no <S%G3756><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> there; <S%G1563><s%> and they need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> candle, <S%G3088><s%> neither light <S%G5457><s%> of the sun; <S%G2246><s%> for the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gives them light: <S%G5461><s%> and they shall reign <S%G936><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to me, These <S%G3778><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> are faithful <S%G4103><s%> and true: <S%G228><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> his angel <S%G32><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> to his servants <S%G1401><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> shortly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly: <S%G5035><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that keeps <S%G5083><s%> the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book. <S%G975><s%>

And I John <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, and heard <S%G191><s%> them. And when <S%G3753><s%> I had heard <S%G191><s%> and seen, <S%G991><s%> I fell <S%G4098><s%> down to worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> me these <S%G5023><s%> things.

Then <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to me, See <S%G3708><s%> you do it not: for I am <S%G1510><s%> your fellow servant, <S%G4889><s%> and of your brothers <S%G80><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and of them which keep <S%G5083><s%> the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book: <S%G975><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, Seal <S%G4972><s%> not the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book: <S%G975><s%> for the time <S%G2540><s%> is at <S%G1451><s%> hand. <S%G1451><s%>

He that is unjust, <S%G91><s%> let him be unjust <S%G91><s%> still: <S%G2089><s%> and he which is filthy, <S%G4510><s%> let him be filthy <S%G4510><s%> still: <S%G2089><s%> and he that is righteous, <S%G1342><s%> let him be righteous <S%G1344><s%> still: <S%G2089><s%> and he that is holy, <S%G40><s%> let him be holy <S%G37><s%> still. <S%G2089><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly; <S%G5035><s%> and my reward <S%G3408><s%> is with me, to give <S%G591><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G5613><s%> as his work <S%G2041><s%> shall be.
I am <S%G1510><s%> Alpha <S%G1><s%> and Omega, <S%G5598><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> and the end, <S%G5056><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and the last. <S%G2078><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that do <S%G4160><s%> his commandments, <S%G1785><s%> that they may have <S%G2071><s%> right <S%G1849><s%> to the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> and may enter <S%G1525><s%> in through the gates <S%G4440><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city. <S%G4172><s%>

For without <S%G1854><s%> are dogs, <S%G2965><s%> and sorcerers, <S%G5333><s%> and fornicators, <S%G4205><s%> and murderers, <S%G5406><s%> and idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> and whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> loves <S%G5368><s%> and makes <S%G4160><s%> a lie. <S%G5579><s%>

I Jesus <S%G2424><s%> have sent <S%G3992><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> to testify <S%G3140><s%> to you these <S%G5023><s%> things in the churches. <S%G1577><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> and the offspring <S%G1085><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> and the bright <S%G2986><s%> and morning <S%G3720><s%> star. <S%G792><s%>

And the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and the bride <S%G3565><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%> And let him that hears <S%G191><s%> say, <S%G2036><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%> And let him that is thirsty <S%G1372><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%> And whoever <S%G3588><s%> will, <S%G2309><s%> let him take <S%G2902><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> freely. <S%G1432><s%>

For I testify <S%G4828><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G3956><s%> that hears <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book, <S%G975><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man shall add <S%G2007><s%> to these <S%G5023><s%> things, God <S%G2316><s%> shall add <S%G2007><s%> to him the plagues <S%G4127><s%> that are written <S%G1125><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> book: <S%G975><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man shall take <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> from the words <S%G3056><s%> of the book <S%G976><s%> of this <S%G5129><s%> prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall take <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> his part <S%G3313><s%> out of the book <S%G976><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> and out of the holy <S%G40><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and from the things which are written <S%G1125><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> book. <S%G975><s%>

He which testifies <S%G3140><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things said, <S%G3004><s%> Surely <S%G3483><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> Even <S%G3483><s%> so, <S%G3483><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
